content:
Archineer Associates has been providing Civil; Structural Engineering services since its beginning, concentrating on Structure design, Foundation design of variety infrastructures .

  • Topographical survey
  • Soil investigation & geotechnical evaluation
  • Earth retaining and slope protection structures
  • Pile and foundation design
  • Reinforced concrete and pre-stressed concrete structures
  • Steel structures
  • high-rise building and bridge structures
  • Road and highway
  • Storm drain and drainage
  • Transmission tower
  • Telecommunication tower
  • Elevated water tank tower
  • Hydropower dam and hydraulic structures
